title: I think my main account got hacked, please help.

embed.description: League of Legends (LoL) Summoner data for girllovers in North America. Contains statistics, match data and more to help players analyze and improve performance.

body: I think my main account(girlovers ) got hacked and I cant get it back even though I try so many time.

replies.body: Hmmmm I took a quick look over your other account and I do see where some suspicious activity happened earlier on. Your best bet would be to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and selecting "I need help recovering my account".
